item.title: 8 Steps to Migrating from JavaScript to TypeScript
item.description: We have been moving our Browser Agent to TypeScript recently. Itâ€™s fun to learn a new language and to see how it can benefit us. Let me share with you how we have been doing it! Why TypeScript Before moving to TypeScript, our browser agent has thousands lines of code but in just two JavaScript files. We feel obliged to refactor it so as to make our life easier when adding more features.
